name: simplicite
description: Simplicite(R) platform Javascript API (for node.js and browser)

scripts.build: tsc --declaration --sourceMap --moduleResolution node --module esnext --target esnext --outDir ./dist/esm ./src/simplicite.ts && tsc --declaration --sourceMap --module commonjs --target es5 --esModuleInterop true --outDir ./dist/cjs ./src/simplicite.ts && webpack build ./src/browser.js
scripts.doc: jsdoc -t node_modules/docdash -d docs ./dist/esm/simplicite.js README.md && replace '#fc83ff' '#98cbff' docs/styles/jsdoc.css && replace '#6d426d' '#2e76bd' docs/styles/jsdoc.css && replace '#CA79CA' '#edb8b8' docs/styles/jsdoc.css && replace '#606' '#094e93' docs/styles/jsdoc.css

author: Simplicite Software <contact@simplicitesoftware.com> (http://www.simplicitesoftware.com/)
